title: Is there any Magic Resist items with +20% CDR?
body: With the 5% CDR Mastery taken away as well as the CDR nerf for Lucidity Boots, you'd need more cooldown reduction items to buy. For armor items, there's Frozen Heart or Iceborn Gauntlet, this is good against 2 - 5 AD based enemies. However, sometimes you run into team with 4 - 5 AP and you want to get Magic Resist items but need to max your CDR too, then you realized that all the Magic Resist items are all only 10% CDR. Is there a solution for this?
